# Arabic Language Pack V2 for Flarum

## Installation
 
Install Manualy : 

```bash
composer require ziymed/lang-ar
```

## Updating

```bash
composer update ziymed/lang-ar
php flarum cache:clear
```

## Deleting

```bash
composer remove ziymed/lang-ar
php flarum cache:clear
```

## This ext can do :

- Arabic translation
- RTL switch
- Discussion List Item rtl tooltip
